# kCISamplerColorSpace

**Global Variable**

The key for the color space to use when sampling the image.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCISamplerColorSpace: String
```

## Discussion

The associated value must be an RGB [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGColorSpace] object. Using this option specifies that samples should be converted to this color space before being passed to a kernel. If not specified, samples will be passed to the kernel in the working color space of the Core Image context used to render the image.

## Constants

- **kCISamplerAffineMatrix**: The key for an affine matrix. The associated value is an `NSArray` object ([*a b c d tx ty*]) that defines the transformation to apply to the sampler.
- **kCISamplerWrapMode**: The key for the sampler wrap mode. The wrap mode specifies how Core Image produces pixels that are outside the extent of the sample. Possible values are [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/kCISamplerWrapBlack] and [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/kCISamplerWrapClamp].
- **kCISamplerFilterMode**: The key for the filtering to use when sampling the image. Possible values are [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/kCISamplerFilterNearest] and [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/kCISamplerFilterLinear].
